data.name: MenuFile
data.comment: Menu title for file operation

data.name: MenuFileOpen
data.comment: Menu title to open a document or file

data.name: MenuFileSaveSelected
data.comment: Menu title to save the selected files

data.name: MenuFileSaveAll
data.comment: Menu title to save all files

data.name: MenuFileQuit
data.comment: Menu title to quit the app

data.name: MenuDocument
data.comment: Menu title for document options

data.name: MenuDocumentShowImages
data.comment: Menu title to set or unset whether embedded images are displayed in the preview

data.name: MenuDocumentShowOther
data.comment: Menu title to set or unset whether other files are shown in the listview

data.name: MenuDocumentKeepStructure
data.comment: Menu title to set or unset whether the embedded structure is kept when extracting files

data.name: MenuDocumentOpenExplorer
data.comment: Menu title to set or unset whether Windows Explorer is opened after extraction

data.name: MenuAppearance
data.comment: Menu title for the view settings of the app

data.name: MenuAppearanceDarkmode
data.comment: Menu title to set or unset dark mode

data.name: MenuAppearanceLanguage
data.comment: Menu title of the language selection

data.name: MenuAppearanceLanguageEnglish
data.comment: Menu title for English (app translation)

data.name: MenuAppearanceLanguageGerman
data.comment: Menu title for German (app translation)

data.name: MenuHelp
data.comment: Menu title of the help menu section

data.name: MenuHelpAbout
data.comment: Menu title to call the "About" dialog

data.name: MenuHelpWebsite
data.comment: Menu title to call the app project website

data.name: MenuHelpChangeLog
data.comment: Menu title to call the change log file

data.name: MenuHelpLicense
data.comment: Menu title to call the license file

data.name: ButtonOpen
data.comment: Button text to open a file or document

data.name: LabelListview
data.comment: Label of the listview that shows the embedded files

data.name: ListViewColumnName
data.comment: Column name for the embedded file name

data.name: ListViewColumnExtension
data.comment: Column name for the file extension

data.name: ListViewColumnPath
data.comment: Column name for the relative path of the embedded file

data.name: ButtonSave
data.comment: Button text to save one or multiple files

data.name: ButtonSaveAll
data.comment: Button text to save all files

data.name: LabelPreview
data.comment: Label of the preview section

data.name: AboutAuthor
data.comment: Author label in the 'About' dialog

data.name: AboutCloseButton
data.comment: Label of the close button in the 'About' dialog

data.name: AboutDate
data.comment: Release date label in the 'About' dialog

data.name: AboutDescription
data.value: Media Extractor is an application to preview and extract packed media in Microsoft Office files (e.g. Word, PowerPoint or Excel documents) or common archives (e.g. zip, 7z or tar)
data.comment: App description in the 'Abou' dialog. It wraps, but will be truncated if too long

data.name: AboutHeader
data.comment: Dialog title of the 'About' dialog

data.name: AboutLicense
data.comment: License label in the 'About' dialog

data.name: AboutVersion
data.comment: Version number label in the 'About' dialog

data.name: AboutWebsite
data.comment: Website label in the 'About' dialog

data.name: ButtonSaveSelected
data.comment: Button text to save the selected files

data.name: CrcDescription
data.value: CRC32 (cyclic redundancy check) is a simple hashing method to compare whether data or files are identical. However, CRC does not provide a 100% guarantee that two files are identical. But it is a strong evidence if the size of both files are identical and no malicious tampering is to be expected.
data.comment: Text to explain CRC32 in a tooltip. It wraps, but will be truncated if too long

data.name: DialogButtonCancel
data.comment: Button text to cancel the file extraction

data.name: DialogButtonCancelTooltip
data.comment: Button tooltip to cancel the file extraction

data.name: DialogButtonOverwrite
data.comment: Button text to overwrite files

data.name: DialogButtonOverwriteTooltip
data.comment: Button tooltip to overwrite files

data.name: DialogButtonRename
data.comment: Button text to rename extracted files instead of overwriting existing

data.name: DialogButtonRenameTooltip
data.comment: Button tooltip to rename extracted files instead of overwriting existing

data.name: DialogButtonSkip
data.comment: Button text to skip a file during extraction

data.name: DialogButtonSkipTooltip
data.value: Skip the extraction of the file
data.comment: Button tooltip to skip a file during extraction

data.name: DialogCancelTitle
data.comment: Dialog title when an operation was canceled

data.name: DialogErrorTitle
data.comment: Dialog title when errors occurred

data.name: DialogExplorerError
data.value: The path '{0}' could not be opened
data.comment: Dialog text with mandatory parameter {0} if a path is invalid

data.name: DialogHeader
data.comment: Dialog title if a file already exists

data.name: DialogLabelCrc
data.comment: Dialog label for a CRC32 value

data.name: DialogLabelDate
data.comment: Dialog label for a date

data.name: DialogLabelExisting
data.comment: Dialog label for the section of an existing file

data.name: DialogLabelName
data.comment: Dialog label for a file name

data.name: DialogLabelNew
data.comment: Dialog label for the section of a new file to extract

data.name: DialogLabelSize
data.comment: Dialog label for a file size

data.name: DialogRememberCheckbox
data.comment: Dialog label for a checkbox to remember the decision of the user

data.name: DialogSaveAllTitle
data.value: Select a Folder to save all Files...
data.comment: Dialog title to select a folder to extract all files into it

data.name: DialogSaveCurrentTitle
data.comment: Dialog title to select a path to extract the current file into it

data.name: DialogSaveErrors
data.comment: Dialog text if not all files could be extracted

data.name: DialogSaveFailure
data.value: The file could not be saved
data.comment: Dialog text if the selected file could not be saved

data.name: DialogSaveFilter
data.comment: File filter in a "Save as" dialog

data.name: DialogSaveSelectedTitle
data.value: Select a Folder to save the selected Files...
data.comment: Dialog title to select a folder to extract the selected files into it

data.name: DialogUnexpectedError
data.value: There was an unexpected error during the extraction:
data.comment: Warning text in a dialog, if something went wrong during the extraction

data.name: DropAreaWatermark
data.comment: Watermark text of a GUI drop zone

data.name: StatusSaveCanceled
data.comment: Status message, indicating that the save process was canceled

data.name: StatusSaveErrorSummary
data.value: {0} files extracted ({1} overwritten, {2} renamed), {3} skipped, {4} not extracted (errors)
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameters {0}, {1}, {2}, {3} and {4}, that summarizes a file extraction process

data.name: StatusSaveFailure
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that the file could not be saved

data.name: StatusSaveSuccess
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that the file was saved

data.name: StatusSaveSummary
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameters {0}, {1}, {2} and {3}, that summarizes a file extraction process

data.name: TextErrorMultipleFiles
data.comment: General text with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating how many files could not be extracted

data.name: TextErrorOneFile
data.value: One file could not be extracted.
data.comment: General text, indicating that one file could not be extracted

data.name: TextNoPreview
data.comment: General text, indicating that there is no preview

data.name: TextSaveError
data.value: The path '{0}' could not be opened
data.comment: General text with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that the path could not be opened

data.name: TextSkippedMultipleFiles
data.comment: General text with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating how many files were skipped during the extraction

data.name: TextSkippedOneFile
data.comment: General text, indicating that one file was skipped during the extraction

data.name: DialogLoadFailure
data.value: The file could not be loaded.\n{0}\nError Message: {1}
data.comment: Dialog text with the mandatory parameters {0} and {1} if a file could not be loaded

data.name: DialogLoadFilter
data.comment: File filter in a "Open File" dialog

data.name: DialogLoadTitle
data.comment: Dialog title in a "Open File" dialog

data.name: StatusLoaded
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating what file is currently selected

data.name: StatusLoadFailure
data.value: The file could not be loaded
data.comment: Status message, indicating that the file could not be loaded

data.name: StatusLoading
data.comment: Status message, indicating, that a file is currently be loaded

data.name: TextInvalidFormat
data.value: The file may be not a valid Office file or archive.
data.comment: General text, indicating that the input file has a not supported format

data.name: TextInvalidPath
data.value: It looks like the filename is not valid. Please check the file name and path.
data.comment: General text, indicating that a path seems to be invalid

data.name: TextLockedFile
data.value: Please make sure that the file is not open in another application.
data.comment: General text, indicating that a file is probably locked by another application

data.name: DialogMissingChangelog
data.value: The change log '{0}' was not found.
data.comment: Dialog text with the mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that the changelog was not found

data.name: DialogMissingChangelogTitle
data.comment: Dialog title, indicating that the changelog was not found

data.name: DialogMissingLicense
data.value: The license file '{0}' was not found.
data.comment: Dialog text with the mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that the license was not found

data.name: DialogMissingLicenseTitle
data.comment: Dialog title, indicating that the license was not found

data.name: StatusEmbeddedLoaded
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating how many files were loaded

data.name: StatusLoadEmbeddedImageFailure
data.value: Embedded file could not be loaded: {0}
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that the currently selected file could not be loaded

data.name: StatusLoadEmbeddedOtherFailure
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that the currently selected file could not be used as image preview

data.name: StatusLoadEmbeddedTextFailure
data.value: Text / XML file could not be loaded: {0}
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that the currently selected file could not be displayed as text

data.name: StatusLoadingEmbedded
data.comment: Status message, indicating, that an embedded file is currently be loaded

data.name: MenuAppearanceLanguageDefault
data.comment: Menu title of the default language

data.name: DialogMissingWebsite
data.value: The project website could not be loaded
data.comment: Dialog text, indicating that the app project website was not found

data.name: DialogMissingWebsiteTitle
data.comment: Dialog title, indicating that the app project website was not found

data.name: TextErrorInvalidImage
data.value: Image preview could not be created
data.comment: General text, indicating that a preview image could not be created

data.name: TextErrorInvalidText
data.value: Text preview could not be created
data.comment: General text, indicating that a preview text could not be created

data.name: DialogInvalidExtensions
data.value: An error occurred during the retrieval of the file extensions for the previews. The default values are restored
data.comment: Dialog text if errors occurred because of invalid file extensions

data.name: StatusReady
data.comment: Status message, indicating, that the app is ready

data.name: ListViewColumnSize
data.comment: Column name for the file size of the embedded file

data.name: DialogMissingRecentFile
data.value: The file was not found:\n{0}\nShould the entry be removed from the recent file list?
data.comment: Dialog text with the mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that a recent file was not found (question to remove)

data.name: MenuFileClearRecent
data.comment: Menu title to clear recent files

data.name: MenuFileRecent
data.comment: Menu title for the recent files

data.name: DialogSizeWarning
data.value: The preview of a large file (> {0}) is attempted.\nThis process may take a long time.\nShall the preview be created?
data.comment: Warning text with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that a file could be too large for a preview

data.name: DialogSizeWarningTitle
data.value: Attempt to preview a large File...
data.comment: Dialog title if a file could be too large for a preview

data.name: MenuDocumentGenerictextPreview
data.value: Text Preview on unknown File Formats
data.comment: Menu title to set or unset preview of unknown file extensions

data.name: MenuDocumentSizeWarning
data.value: Show Warning for Preview of large Files
data.comment: Menu title to set or unset whether a warning should be shown if large files should be displayed in the preview

data.name: StatusLoadEmbeddedImageFallback
data.value: The preview image for '{0}' could not be loaded. Displaying as text
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that the currently selected file could not be used as image preview, and it is displayed as text

data.name: StatusLoadEmbeddedOtherFallback
data.value: The preview for '{0}' could not be loaded. Displaying as text
data.comment: Status message with mandatory parameter {0}, indicating that the currently selected file could not be used as image preview, and it is displayed as text

data.name: StatusPreviewSkipped
data.value: The preview of '{0}' was skipped (file too large)
data.comment: Status message, indicating that the file preview was skipped, because the file was too large

data.name: MenuAppearanceLanguageFrench
data.comment: Menu title for French (app translation)

data.name: MenuAppearanceLanguageSpanish
data.comment: Menu title for Spanish (app translation)

data.name: MenuAppearanceLanguageJapanese
data.comment: Menu title for Japanese (app translation)

data.name: MenuAppearanceLanguageItalian
data.comment: Menu title for Italian (app translation)
